title.value: Methodological aspects of evaluation of structural cause-consequence factors of the stable development of economy оf agricultural enterprises
Методологические аспекты оценки структурных причинно-следственных факторов устойчивого развития экономики сельскохозяйственных предприятий

journal.title: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of Belarus. Agrarian Series

person.name: Kovel, P. V., Belarus State Academy of Agriculture, Gorki (Belarus)

abstract.value: The article presents the development and substantiation of the methodology which allows explaining the mechanism of effects of structural changes on the basis of the description of the content of cause-consequence factors. Also due to this methodology it is possible to identify and measure the changes of structures using special indices and algorithm of their calculation. Shown is the substantiation of the method of evaluation of the influence of structures on the dynamics of economic results of agricultural enterprises.
